statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, email, created_at FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';

SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT id, user_id FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT id, permission_level FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT MAX(permission_level) AS max_permission FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, permission_level FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.id = permissions.user_id WHERE permission_level > 2;

SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username, password FROM users INNER JOIN access_logs ON users.id = access_logs.user_id;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' AND password = 'password123';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, g.group_name FROM users u JOIN user_network_mapping m ON u.id = m.user_id JOIN network_groups g ON m.group_id = g.group_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.role_id;

SELECT users.username, network_groups.group_name FROM users JOIN user_network_mapping ON users.id = user_network_mapping.user_id JOIN network_groups ON user_network_mapping.group_id = network_groups.group_id;

SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name, network_groups.group_name FROM users JOIN user_network_mapping ON users.id = user_network_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.role_id JOIN network_groups ON user_network_mapping.group_id = network_groups.group_id;

SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT d.device_name, u.username, n.access_level FROM devices d JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.id JOIN network_access n ON d.device_id = n.device_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id

SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1,2,3)
SELECT device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
